meanings.definition: A type of sauce made from a roux and stock, typically chicken or fish.
meanings.sent1: The chef poured veloute over the chicken, making it delicious.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make veloute sauce in my cooking class.
meanings.sent3: The veloute sauce danced on the chicken, adding flavor to every bite.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking was like a veloute, blending different ingredients perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The veloute sauce was so creamy and rich, it elevated the dish to a whole new level.

meanings.definition: To prepare or cook with a veloute sauce.
meanings.sent1: She decided to veloute the fish for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: I veloute the vegetables to give them a savory taste.
meanings.sent3: He veloutes with such skill, every dish tastes amazing.
meanings.sent4: The chef velouted the soup, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Velouting the pasta made it more flavorful and satisfying.
